metadata.interface_mandate: Ensures all runtime constants derived from the Config Hash are traceable, immutable for the active manifest version, and accessible for L2 and L6 validation.

viability_margin_oracle.notes: Controls dynamic computation of the epsilon safety margin.

constraint_budget_matrix.notes: Static resource allocation limits enforced by the CBM.

metric_efficacy_contract.notes: Weighting schema used by MEC for synthesizing critical metrics.
